Title: Relates to the submission of claims for services provided by home care agencies
Summary: Provides that the submission of claims for services provided by home care agencies shall be done on forms approved by the centers for Medicare and Medicaid services.
LawCode: Amd ยง3614-e, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to the submission of claims for services provided by home care agencies
